ObjectContext.description: The unique context of an object

get_key.description: The Unique Key of the task. Its autogenerated

title.description: The Title of the Task. Can only have 60 letters

description.description: The Description of the Task. Optional
description.example: We need Approval for this Request in Order to move the asset

dueDate.description: The Date when the Task is due

resultMessage.description: The message that contains the result needed to close this task

modifiedAt.description: The Date when the Task was last changed

createdAt.description: The Date when the Task created

Error.description: The Error object used if this task has an error

Supplier.description: An object that describes who supplies the task

key.description: The Unique Key of the task. Its autogenerated

attempts.description: A counter documenting the import attempts

created.description: The Date time of the creation date

finished.description: The Date time of the finished date

dueDate.description: The Date time of the due date

modified.description: The Date time of the date on which this task was updated/changed

description.example: To do this task you have to...

documents.description: The additional files to this task

additionalProperties.description: A Map of key description pairs, that describe the payload. Every Application has their own payload classes

payload.description: A Map of key description pairs, that describe the payload. Every Application has their own payload classes

sourceSystem.description: The source system for this task

targetSystem.description: The target system for this task

targetSystemExternalId.description: The external id for the target system

type.description: The Type of the task. The typ should inform user and applications what kind of payload has to be expected

TaskObject.description: The Object that this task belongs to

assets.description: The key of every asset that should be part of the inventory

items.description: The key of every asset that should be part of the inventory

supplier.description: The supplier that has to do this inventory

location.description: The location of every asset if all assets are at the same place

dueDate.description: The due date of this inventory

status.description: The state of the inventory. If this field is keept empty, the state NEW will be used

InventoryOrder.description: The Request that results in the creation of a new Inventory

comment.description: A comment that is added to the created User Task

ReturnRequest.description: The request to return an inventory to the FEK

reason.description: The reason why the inventory was declined. This reason will be used for the automatic created task.

DeclineRequest.description: The request to decline an inventory

country.description: The this vatId is associated with

taxCodeDeparture.description: The tax code of the departing country

taxCodeDestination.description: The tax code of the destination country

validFrom.description: From when this vatId is valid

validUntil.description: Up until when this vatId is valid

deactivated.description: The flag, that shows, if the VatId is deactivated

city.description: The City of the location. Optional unless the location list is empty

country.description: The Country of the location. Optional unless the location list is empty

postcode.description: The postcode of the location. Optional unless the location list is empty

state.description: The state of the location. Optional unless the location list is empty

street.description: The street of the location. Optional unless the location list is empty

geoCode.description: The place id from the mapping service

Location.description: Object to create the location for a company

InventoryMetaRequest.description: The request for the inventory patch.

InventoryPositionMetaRequest.description: The request to add technical information to the inventoryPosition

locationKey.description: The key of the new location

LocationUpdate.description: The Request that updates the location information for an inventory position

FinishPositionBody.description: The request that contains the followupProcess

InfoTextRequest.description: The request to add or change the Info Texts

additionalProperties.description: Map of all values for a given set of metadata

items.description: Map of all values for a given set of metadata

FilterProperties.description: Map of all values for a given set of metadata

PositionStatusReport.description: Describes the different Position Objects and their status for an inventory

Asset History.description: An asset history of inventory positions and inventory

Inventory History.description: The inventory history for one inventory for an asset
